metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11373 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds read in File__Analyze::Get_L8 in File__Analyze_Buffer.cppin MediaInfoLib in MediaArea MediaInfo 18.12 leads to a crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11373` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmediainfo0v5 - 18.12-2
python-mediainfodll - 18.12-2
python3-mediainfodll - 18.12-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmediainfo package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '18.12-2').
